name: @cadl-api-spec/azure-language-qnagenerate
author: Microsoft Corporation
description: The language service API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills built with best-in-class Microsoft machine learning algorithms. The API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, language detection, question answering and question answers generation. Further documentation can be found in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/text-analytics/overview.
